rules_text:
When Elixir Provisioner enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Elixir Provisioner: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
notes:
WU:
 - Five or more artifacts
 - Metalcraft
GW:
 - Odd MVs
 - +1/+1 counters
WB:
 - triggered abilities
 - flicker
RW:
 - MV 3 or less
 - Shipwright
